answers.answer: Even if you failed your test, your fine one meal. It's not an all or nothing thing; it's gradual and you won't have any significant issues all of a sudden. Your stomach probably hurts because you fasted, then ate a bunch. Don't stress ;)

I failed all my test the 1 and 3 hour and if you eat relatively healthy your fine ..they say I have gestational diabetes but the nutritionist I had to see didn't have any advice as to how I can change my diet to help battle my sugar ...your stomach hurt probably because your not used to so much sugar in one day or in a short period of time ..is stay away from the sweets that are easily broken down like pop , cookies, candy etc. and make sure you eat more veggies and stuff the rest of the day...

question: I just got back from the doc and before doing the test I was advised that I had to fast (which I did) I just finished eating breakfast and had 2 griddle sandwiches (not to big) and orange juice, with the sugar that was in the pancakes and the orange juice do you ladies think maybe I shouldn't have had extra sugar after that sugary drink for the gt?? Only thing I have to say is my stomach started to hurt so I stopped eating the pancakes on the last sandwich and just finished the sasuage and egg
title: 1 hour glucose test?? eating/drinking afterwards
